alert.note: Alert for Carteret; Craven; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:25AM EDT until July 14 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Carteret County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 415 AM EDT. * At 325 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morehead City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, South River, North River, Merrimon, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Florence, Otway, Broad Creek, Janeiro, Great Neck, Wildwood, Whortonsville, Open Grounds Farm, Bogue, Maribel, Nc Pamlico and North Harlowe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
